entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Mayor Card: City Management
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,29¬†‚Ç¨ [0,29¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 1,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,29¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES! Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history! Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you‚Äôre out of office‚Äîmaintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices‚Äîevery decision is yours! ‚Ä¢ Swipe & Decide ‚Äì Instant control, deep consequence. ‚Ä¢ Triple Balance System ‚Äì People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green. ‚Ä¢ Chain Cards ‚Äì Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future. ‚Ä¢ Adventure Cards ‚Äì Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends. ‚Ä¢ Character Stories ‚Äì Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief‚Ä¶ each NPC steers you to a different ending. ‚Ä¢ Endless Replayability ‚Äì Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new. LAUNCH DISCOUNT ‚Äî NOW LIVE! Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

entry.title: Dungeon and Puzzles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

-- Awards: ‚óè 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection ‚óè Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual ‚óè Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award About: Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves. There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms. To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move. Features: ‚óè Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban ‚óè 150 handcrafted rooms ‚óè Fantasy themed pixel art ‚óè Non-linear dungeon map -- ‚óè Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/nekolyst ‚óè Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ‚óè Join our Discord server https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Groundwire: VoIP SIP Softphone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 5,99¬†‚Ç¨ [5,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 9,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨

Compras integradas

  • ZRTP For Outgoing CallsÔºö29,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Acrobits Groundwire: Elevate Your Communication Acrobits, a leader in UCaaS and communication solutions for over 20 years, proudly introduces the Acrobits Groundwire softphone. This top-tier SIP softphone client offers unmatched voice and video call clarity. A softphone designed for both personal and professional use, it seamlessly integrates quality communication with an intuitive interface. IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ Groundwire is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. You must have service with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports use on a standard SIP client to use it. Choosing the Best Softphone App Experience robust communication with a leading SIP softphone application. Preconfigured for major VoIP providers, this softphone app guarantees high-quality, secure, and intuitive calling. Perfect for maintaining connections with friends, family, and colleagues, maximizing all aspects of your VoIP experience. Key Features of the SIP Softphone - Exceptional Audio Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with support for multiple formats including Opus and G.729. - HD Video Calls: Conduct up to 720p HD video calls, supported by H.264 and VP8. - Robust Security: Our SIP softphone app ensures private conversations with military-grade encryption. - Battery Efficiency: Thanks to our efficient push notifications, you can stay connected with minimal battery drain. - Seamless Call Transition: Our VoIP dialer smoothly switches between WiFi and data plans during calls. - Softphone Customization: Tailor your SIP settings, UI, and ringtones. - 5G and Multi-Device Support: Ready for the future, compatible with most mobile operating systems. Other features included on this robust app include: instant messaging, attended and unattended transfers, group calls, voicemail, and extensive customization for each SIP account. More Than Just a VoIP Softphone Dialer Groundwire softphone offers more than the standard VoIP dialer experience. It‚Äôs a comprehensive tool for crystal clear Wi-Fi calling, equipped with robust business VoIP dialer features. It offers a secure and reliable softphone choice with no hidden fees and a one-time cost. Leverage SIP technology for improved call quality. Make this softphone your first choice for dependable, and easy SIP communication. Download a feature-rich and modern SIP softphone now and be part of a community enjoying the best in voice and SIP calling. Transform your daily communication with our exceptional VoIP softphone app.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Acrobits Softphone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 3,99¬†‚Ç¨ [3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨

Compras integradas

  • ZRTP For Outgoing CallsÔºö29,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Make voice and video calls, send messages, and stay connected with Acrobits Softphone App ‚Äî a powerful and feature-rich SIP softphone designed for all your calling needs. IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ Acrobits Softphone is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. To use it, you need an account with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports standard SIP clients. Note: this app does not support call transfer or conference calling. Take your VoIP calling experience to the next level with Acrobits Softphone with out-of-the-box support for many of the most popular providers and Bluetooth devices on the market. Acrobits Softphone brings all the popular features you expect from a SIP app, including support for 5G, voice and video calling, push notifications, call handover between WiFi and data, multi-device compatibility, lifetime access to support and updates, and more. Experience crystal clear calling with support for popular audio standards, including Opus, G.722, G.729, G.711, iLBC, and GSM. Need to make video calls? Acrobits Softphone supports up to 720p HD and supports both H.265 and VP8. You can even create your own look and feel. Acrobits Softphone is fully customizable, allowing you to configure your own SIP call settings, UI, ringtones, and more. Acrobits Softphone makes it easy for you to communicate with friends and family on any device. This SIP calling app is compatible with virtually all iPhones and iPads. Don‚Äôt worry about hidden fees. You can try Acrobits Softphone today for a one-time fee that comes with lifetime support and updates.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Application Description

MagicKit AI ‚Äì Kit de Ferramentas Tudo-em-Um para o Seu Dispositivo O MagicKit AI √© um aplicativo utilit√°rio completo, projetado para ajud√°-lo a monitorar seu dispositivo, otimizar o desempenho e acessar ferramentas do dia a dia em uma interface pr√°tica. Desenvolvido especialmente para iOS, o MagicKit AI re√∫ne funcionalidades essenciais enquanto protege sua privacidade e economiza bateria. Ferramentas do Dispositivo e do Sistema ‚Ä¢ Status da Bateria: Veja o n√≠vel de carga e o estado atual da bateria ‚Ä¢ Uso de Armazenamento: Analise o espa√ßo usado e dispon√≠vel ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes do Dispositivo: Verifique detalhes do hardware e do sistema ‚Ä¢ Tempo de Atividade: Monitore h√° quanto tempo o dispositivo est√° ligado ‚Ä¢ Dicas de Bateria: Receba conselhos √∫teis para melhorar o uso da bateria ‚Ä¢ Limpeza de Fotos: Detecte e remova fotos duplicadas ou semelhantes ‚Ä¢ Limpeza de Contatos: Organize contatos removendo duplicatas e entradas incompletas ‚Ä¢ Gerenciador de RAM: Monitore o uso da mem√≥ria e otimize o desempenho ‚Ä¢ Teste de Benchmark: Avalie o desempenho de CPU, GPU, mem√≥ria e rede Ferramentas de Rede ‚Ä¢ Teste de Velocidade: Me√ßa a velocidade da conex√£o com a internet ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes do Wi-Fi: Veja nome da rede, IP e status da conex√£o ‚Ä¢ Consulta de IP: Verifique a geolocaliza√ß√£o de endere√ßos IP p√∫blicos ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes de Localiza√ß√£o: Acompanhe GPS, velocidade, dire√ß√£o e altitude Seguran√ßa e Privacidade ‚Ä¢ Gerador de Senhas: Crie senhas fortes e seguras com op√ß√µes personaliz√°veis ‚Ä¢ Gerador de Frases de Acesso: Crie frases memor√°veis e seguras ‚Ä¢ Gerador de UUID: Crie identificadores √∫nicos em v√°rios formatos ‚Ä¢ Gerador de PIN Seguro: Gere c√≥digos PIN seguros com v√°rias op√ß√µes ‚Ä¢ E-mail Tempor√°rio: Crie e-mails descart√°veis para proteger sua privacidade Ferramentas Utilit√°rias ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Unidades: Converta entre diferentes unidades de medida ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Moeda e Cripto: Veja taxas de c√¢mbio em tempo real para moedas e criptomoedas ‚Ä¢ Calculadora de Datas: Calcule diferen√ßas entre datas com suporte para dias √∫teis ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Fuso Hor√°rio: Converta hor√°rios com atualiza√ß√µes ao vivo e suporte a hor√°rio de ver√£o ‚Ä¢ Contagem Regressiva e Lembretes: Crie contagens regressivas personalizadas com lembretes e eventos recorrentes ‚Ä¢ Contador M√°gico: Acompanhe m√∫ltiplos contadores com estat√≠sticas e sequ√™ncias ‚Ä¢ Leitor de QR Code: Escaneie c√≥digos QR instantaneamente ‚Ä¢ Scanner de Documentos e Cart√µes: Capture e salve digitaliza√ß√µes com reconhecimento de texto via IA ‚Ä¢ B√∫ssola e N√≠vel: Me√ßa dire√ß√£o e n√≠vel usando os sensores do dispositivo ‚Ä¢ Travar Orienta√ß√£o: Trave a orienta√ß√£o da tela ao usar o app ‚Ä¢ Medidor de √Åudio: Me√ßa n√≠veis de som ao redor com o microfone ‚Ä¢ Gerenciador de √Årea de Transfer√™ncia: Acesse e gerencie textos copiados durante a sess√£o ‚Ä¢ Lanterna e Brilho: Ative a lanterna e ajuste o brilho da tela ‚Ä¢ Bloco de Notas: Crie, organize e gerencie notas com categorias e backup no iCloud ‚Ä¢ Gerador Universal: Gere dados aleat√≥rios como texto, n√∫meros, datas e mais Destaques ‚Ä¢ Interface limpa e f√°cil de usar com ferramentas assistidas ‚Ä¢ Se√ß√£o de Ferramentas em Destaque com as mais populares ‚Ä¢ Sem an√∫ncios ou compras no aplicativo ‚Ä¢ Leve e eficiente no uso de bateria ‚Ä¢ Compat√≠vel com todos os dispositivos iOS ‚Ä¢ Atualiza√ß√µes frequentes com novas ferramentas ‚Ä¢ Desenvolvido com foco em privacidade e desempenho ‚Ä¢ Suporte para tema claro/escuro com anima√ß√µes suaves Perfeito para: ‚Ä¢ Monitorar e otimizar o dispositivo ‚Ä¢ Medi√ß√µes e convers√µes do dia a dia ‚Ä¢ Escanear documentos e QR Codes ‚Ä¢ Limpar fotos e contatos duplicados ‚Ä¢ Criar lembretes e contagens regressivas ‚Ä¢ Acompanhar h√°bitos e progresso ‚Ä¢ Acessar ferramentas r√°pidas como lanterna e brilho ‚Ä¢ Diagn√≥sticos b√°sicos de rede ‚Ä¢ Criar senhas seguras e manter a privacidade ‚Ä¢ Tomar notas r√°pidas e organizadas Baixe o MagicKit AI hoje mesmo e simplifique suas tarefas di√°rias com um kit inteligente e poderoso.

entry.title: Doodle Baseball Game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter‚Äôs box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

N√£o √© necess√°rio conex√£o de internet para ver suas receitas. Monitore quantidades, datas de compra e datas de validade. ‚Ä¢ Mova itens entre a despensa e a lista de compras e vice-versa. ‚Ä¢ Adicione tipos de refei√ß√µes personalizados no planejador de refei√ß√µes. ‚Ä¢ Crie menus reutiliz√°veis que englobem diversos dias.

All Price Information

PriceÔºö14,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Set off on a journey to find the mystical Mana Tree seen in a dream, before discovering... the world map is empty! During your travels, you‚Äôll acquire special artifacts; place these wherever you‚Äôd like on the map to bring towns and dungeons to life and advance the story Meet a colorful cast of characters, square off against fearsome monsters, and explore the vast world of Fa‚ÄôDiel. Not only has the music has been rearranged for this remaster, you can also alternate between the new and original soundtrack. Other features have also been added, including the ability to turn off enemy encounters, and the never-before released mini-game "Ring Ring Land".

entry.title: FINAL FANTASY VII
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö17,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 9,99¬†‚Ç¨ [9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 17,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

------------------------------------------------------ - As this application is very large, it will take some time to download. - This application takes up around 2GB of memory. Over 4GB of free space is required to download it, so make sure that ample spare memory is available before attempting to do so. ------------------------------------------------------ Recommended hardware: iPhone 5s or later, 3rd generation iPad or later, iPad mini 2 or later, iPod touch 6 Supported OS: iOS 8.0 or later *Please be aware that users may experience problems, such as exceptionally slow running speeds, if running this application on devices other than those outlined in the recommended hardware section. Such devices are not suited to playing this game and there is a chance of unforeseen errors occurring if running it on them. Outline The smash hit RPG: Final Fantasy VII, which has sold over 11,000,000 units* worldwide, finally arrives on iOS! *Total includes both packaged sales and downloads. The first Final Fantasy to feature 3D backgrounds and CG movie scenes, this dramatic tale continues to be loved by numerous fans around the world. Battle stages also appear in full 3D for the first time, bringing an even greater sense of awe and spectacle to combat! Customize your characters in any way you like using the fantastic ‚Äúmaterial‚Äù system that allows endless combinations of spells and abilities. This product is a port based on Final Fantasy VII for PC (No changes or additions have been made to the story). Story With its unshakeable monopoly over Mako energy production, the evil Shinra Electric Power Company holds tight to the reigns of world power. One day, a Mako reactor serving the sprawling metropolis of Midgar is attacked and destroyed in a bombing raid by a revolutionary group calling themselves Avalanche. Cloud Strife, a former member of Shinra‚Äôs elite ‚ÄúSoldier‚Äù unit takes part in the raid as a mercenary hired by Avalanche and sets events in motion that will draw him and his friends into an epic struggle for the fate of the planet itself‚Ä¶ Special features for the iOS edition - Play using a simple and comfortable virtual controller designed not to obscure the action, choosing between virtual analogue or fixed 4-way digital control pad options. The opacity of on-screen controls can also be adjusted from the Config Menu. - Two new features to make play easier and more convenient! The iOS edition also includes an option to turn enemy encounters off on the world and area maps (will not skip event battles) and a Max Stats command to become all-powerful in the blink of an eye. Major game controls Movement: Virtual joypad (Select between analogue and digital modes) Menu navigation: Fixed digital buttons Confirm: A button Cancel: B button Open menu: Y button

Application Screenshot

iPad

Application Description

"""""""Explore um mundo de blocos enquanto coleta, cria e constr√≥i para derrotar o terr√≠vel Dracolorde! Construa livremente no DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, dispon√≠vel agora no celular. Trazido a voc√™ pela SQUARE ENIX! ‚óÜ VIAJE E EXPLORE O VASTO MUNDO DE DRAGON QUEST! Neste """"RPG de constru√ß√£o de blocos"""", VOC√ä √© o lend√°rio Construtor! O reino de Alefgrado foi mergulhado na escurid√£o pelo terr√≠vel e trai√ßoeiro Dracolorde, o l√≠der de todos os monstros. Embarque em uma aventura √©pica para recuperar Alefgrado! ‚óÜ ENFRENTE INIMIGOS PERVERSOS! Voc√™ vai encontrar melecos, golens, drag√µes e muito mais. Monstros de todos os tamanhos e j√° conhecidos de DRAGON QUEST amea√ßam a sobreviv√™ncia da humanidade! Fabrique armas, construa defesas e lute contra os monstros para proteger sua base. Use seu poder de constru√ß√£o e jogue com estrat√©gia ao enfrentar inimigos assustadores em combates cheio de a√ß√£o! ‚óÜ COLETE, CRIE E CONSTRUA DE QUALQUER LUGAR! Neste mundo de blocos, tudo o que voc√™ v√™ pode ser usado de material para criar! Cultive ingredientes, fabrique v√°rios itens e construa sua base para reunir as pessoas que vagam pelas ru√≠nas. De pequenas estruturas a cidades inteiras, voc√™ tem a liberdade de deixar o lugar como quiser. O poder de construir est√° na palma das suas m√£os! ‚óÜ CONSTRUA MELHOR NO CELULAR COM OS RECURSOS ESPECIAIS ADICIONADOS! Posicione os blocos simplesmente tocando na tela e destrua blocos e itens mais facilmente com cursores especializados. O conveniente o bot√£o Desfazer adicionado para permitir que voc√™ restaure seu trabalho! Converta suas estruturas em cartas de constru√ß√£o para compartilh√°-las com amigos e escaneie as estruturas deles para que elas apare√ßam na sua ilha! ‚óÜ NOVO CONTE√öDO DISPON√çVEL PARA COMPRA NO APP Novo conte√∫do para download adicionado a ‚ÄúTerra Incognita‚Äù, a terra onde voc√™ pode construir e jogar livremente! Novo conte√∫do inclui: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúTapete m√°gico‚Äù, ‚ÄúKit de modelos de chefes monstros‚Äù, ‚ÄúKit de astronomia‚Äù, ‚ÄúAnel pixelado‚Äù ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúPacote Completo‚Äù (um kit com os 4 acima) *Fique alerta para compras duplicadas."""""" SO: iOS 13 ou posteriores iPhone 8 ou posteriores (m√≠nimo: 3 GB de RAM) *Jogar em um dispositivo n√£o recomendado pode ocasionar erros inesperados, como o travamento por mem√≥ria insuficiente. Aten√ß√£o: talvez n√£o possamos oferecer suporte a dispositivos n√£o recomendados."

entry.title: Trials of Mana
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö22,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 9,99¬†‚Ç¨ [9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 22,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

‚ÄúTrials of Mana,‚Äù the hit console game with over 1 million copies and downloads sold worldwide...is coming to a smartphone near you! Fun for longtime fans of the Mana Series and new players alike! ‚óÜStory When the world was shrouded in darkness, the Goddess of Mana drew forth the Sword of Mana to smite the eight Benevodons, monsters of destruction. She sealed the horrors inside the eight Mana Stones, bringing the realm back from the brink. Weak from rebuilding the world, the Goddess changed into a tree and fell fast asleep for years. However, the forces of evil sought to free the Benevodons to gain control of the world. They started a terrible war to further their plot and destabilize the kingdoms. Peace was at an end. Mana itself began to disappear from the world and the Mana Tree to wither... ‚óÜPlayable Characters Players start their adventure by selecting three of the six main characters. The overlapping story of interwoven destinies changes depending on who you choose as your main character and companions! ‚óÜGraphics See the spectacular world of Mana in full 3D render! Scenes and characters from the original game now in beautifully detailed graphics. ‚óÜBattle System Use the dynamic fighting system to evade enemies and fight back with aerial and combo attacks. Utilize the signature ring menus of the Mana Series and new shortcut commands. ‚óÜPowering Up Characters Switch to light or dark classes to strengthen your characters and change their look. In this remake, there‚Äôs also a newly added Class 4. With over 300 different kinds of abilities available, there are many different ways to train and power up your characters. ‚óÜDifficulty You have the option of four difficulty settings: Beginner, Easy, Normal, and Hard. The Beginner setting allows players to resume in the same spot no matter how many times they get a game over. If you find action games hard or want to focus on the story, select this difficulty. ‚óÜSoundtrack The 60-song soundtrack features arrangements overseen by the original composer, Hiroki Kikuta. Players can switch the BGM to the new version or the SNES version. ‚óÜVoiceover Full voiceover in English and Japanese! The characters in your party determine which extra conversations happen during your journey. ‚óÜNew Game Plus After you beat the game once, you will unlock new storylines for your party members. You can unlock harder difficulties like Expert and the No Future after playing through the new storylines. ‚óÜNew Features Included in the game is the option to play through flashbacks for each character in your party. You‚Äôll also see a familiar Mana Series face when searching for Li‚Äôl Cactus during your adventures. Plus, there are additions like a new type of item seed and the autosave feature. ‚óÜSmartphone-Specific „ÉªMenus are touch-operated. Control characters with the directional pad overlay display. „ÉªNewly added features like auto-target, auto-camera, and auto-battle. „ÉªGraphic quality options available. „ÉªCloud save compatible. „ÉªCan obtain the starting gear ‚ÄúRabite Adornment,‚Äú which increases the EXP gained in battle up to level 17 and ‚ÄúSilktail Adornment,‚Äù which increases the amount of lucre gained in battle up to level 17. „ÄêApp Download„Äë „ÉªThis application is approximately 6.7GB in total. Please ensure you have the necessary storage space available on your device before purchasing. „ÉªAfter starting the game, a large portion of data must be downloaded after defeating the first boss. You can also select ‚ÄúDownload‚Äù on the title screen to download the entire app at once. „ÉªA Wi-Fi connection is highly recommended when downloading the app. „ÄêPlayers„Äë 1 „ÄêRecommended Devices„Äë iPhone 7 and above

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FINAL FANTASY ‚Ö®
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö22,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 11,99¬†‚Ç¨ [11,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 22,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö11,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

-------------------------------------------------- Due to the size of the application, the download may take a considerable amount of time to complete. The app uses 3.9GB of space. When downloading the game for the first time, you must have more than 4GB of space available on your device. Version updates for the app will use more than 4GB of space. Please ensure that there is plenty of space available on your device before downloading. -------------------------------------------------- ‚ñ†Description Selling over 5.5million copies since its release in 2000, FINAL FANTASY IX proudly returns on iOS! Now you can relive the adventures of Zidane and his crew in the palm of your hands! Enjoy this classic FINAL FANTASY experience with no additional fees or purchases. ‚ñ†Story Zidane and the Tantalus Theater Troupe have kidnapped Princess Garnet, the heir of Alexandria. To their surprise, however, the princess herself yearned to escape the castle. Through a series of unusual circumstances, she and her personal guard, Steiner, fall in with Zidane and set out on an incredible journey. Meeting unforgettable characters like Vivi and Quina along the way, they learn about themselves, the secrets of the Crystal, and a malevolent force that threatens to destroy their world. ‚ñ†Gameplay Features „ÉªAbilities Learn new abilities by equipping items. When fully mastered, these abilities can be used even without equipping items, allowing for nearly endless customization options. „ÉªTrance Fill your Trance gauge as you sustain hits in battle. When fully charged, your characters will enter Trance mode, granting them powerful new skills! „ÉªSynthesis Never let items go to waste. Combine two items or pieces of equipment together and make better, stronger items! „ÉªMinigames Whether it's Chocobo Hot and Cold, Jump Rope, or Tetra Master, there are plenty of minigames to enjoy when you're not off saving the world. You can even earn special item rewards! ‚ñ†Additional Features „ÉªAchievements „Éª7 game boosters including high speed and no encounter modes. „ÉªAutosave „ÉªHigh-definition movies and character models. „Éº„Éº„Éº„Éº„Éº„Éº„Éº Operating System iOS 7.0 or later Recommended Devices iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus iPad (4th Generation), iPad Air, iPad Air 2 iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4 iPod touch (6th Generation) We cannot guarantee proper performance on devices other than those listed above. Please confirm your device model before downloading this app.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FINAL FANTASY III (3D REMAKE)
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö17,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 7,99¬†‚Ç¨ [7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 17,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Final Fantasy III -- now on iPhone! When darkness falls and the land is robbed of light, four youths are chosen by the crystals to embark upon a journey to save the world. FINAL FANTASY III was the first title in the FINAL FANTASY series to become a million-seller, establishing once and for all that Square Enix's classic RPG saga was here to stay. A hallmark of innovation for the entire series, FINAL FANTASY III incorporates not only a job system that lets characters change classes at any time to the ability to summon powerful creatures such as Shiva and Bahamut. The 3D remake of FINAL FANTASY III, with fully-rendered 3D graphics, duplicated the original's success. - The four protagonists have been completely redesigned and new scenarios have been added. - The 3D remake has really brought the cutscenes and battles to life. - The Job system has been improved to bring out its best and most unique aspects, resulting in a more balanced game that is easy to enjoy. - New save functions, including autosave, allow for players to quit the game at any time without fear of losing their progress. -------------------------------------------- Aditionally, the smartphone version has been improved to include the following: - High resolution graphics and retouched cutscenes. - Smooth, intuitive touch-panel controls specifically tailored to improve the gaming experience. - Gallery Mode, where players can view illustrations from the game or listen to the soundtrack, has been added. - New visual designs for the Job Mastery Cards and the Mognet .

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: CHRONO TRIGGER (Upgrade Ver.)
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 5,99¬†‚Ç¨ [5,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 9,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Journey to the forgotten past, to the far future, and to the end of time. A big adventure to save the planet, now begins‚Ä¶ CHRONO TRIGGER is the timeless role-playing classic developed by the ‚ÄòDream Team‚Äô of DRAGON QUEST creator Yuji Horii, Dragon Ball creator Akira Toriyama, and the creators of FINAL FANTASY. As the story unfolds, embark on a journey to different eras: the present, the middle ages, the future, prehistory, and ancient times! Whether you're a first-time player or a longtime fan, this epic quest to save a planet's future promises hours of enthralling adventure! As the definitive version of CHRONO TRIGGER, not only have the controls been updated, the graphics and sound have also been revamped to make your adventure even more fun and enjoyable to play. To complete your journey, also included is the mysterious ‚ÄòDimensional Vortex‚Äô dungeon and the forgotten ‚ÄòLost Sanctum‚Äô dungeon. Meet the challenges presented to you and long-lost secrets may be revealed... Story: A chance encounter amid the festivities of Guardia's Millennial Fair in Leene Square introduces our young hero, Crono, to a girl by the name of Marle. Deciding to explore the fair together, the two soon find themselves at an exhibition of the Telepod, the latest invention by Crono's longtime friend Lucca. Marle, fearless and brimming with curiosity, volunteers to assist in a demonstration. An unanticipated malfunction, however, sends her hurtling through a rift in the dimensions. Taking hold of the girl's pendant, Crono bravely follows in pursuit. But the world into which he emerges is the one of four centuries before. Journey to the forgotten past, the distant future, and even to the very End of Time. The epic quest to save a planet's future makes history once again. Key features: Active Time Battle Version 2 During battle, time will not stop, and you can enter commands when the character's gauge is full. The enemies' positions will change as time passes, so choose your actions based on any given situation. ‚ÄòTech‚Äô moves and combos During battle, you can unleash special ‚ÄòTech‚Äô moves, including abilities and/or magic and characters can combine these abilities to unleash all new combo attacks which are unique to them. There are over 50 different types of combos that you can execute between two and three characters! Experience the 'Dimensional Vortex' and the 'Lost Sanctum' dungeons The Dimensional Vortex: a mysterious, ever-changing dungeon existing outside of space and time. What wonders await you at its center? The Lost Sanctum: enigmatic gates in prehistoric and medieval times will lead you to these forgotten chambers. Meet the challenges presented to you and long-lost secrets may be revealed... Graphics and sound While keeping the atmosphere of the original, the graphics have been updated in higher resolution. As for the sound and music, under the supervision of composer Yasunori Mitsuda, all songs have been updated for an even more immersive gameplay experience. Autosave In addition to saving at a save point or choosing to quit from the menu, your progress is saved automatically while traversing the map. --------------------------------------------

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Aprimorando a sua for√ßa atrav√©s do trabalho f√≠sico e melhorando a sua magia realizando tarefas mais mentais, voc√™ poder√° moldar o seu personagem como preferir de acordo com a sua escolha de trabalho. ‚Ä¢ Conquiste calabou√ßos usando um bom gerenciamento Escolha uma quantidade limitada de comida, itens e equipamento de acampamento para levar com voc√™, saindo da seguran√ßa da cidade para explorar o desconhecido. Voc√™ lutar√° contra os monstros, as varia√ß√µes do clima e a validade da comida nas diversas fronteiras de Anto√©cia. Voc√™ precisar√° tomar esse tipo de decis√£o em sua jornada atrav√©s do continente, passando por lugares onde ningu√©m nunca pisou antes. ‚Ä¢ Sistema de batalha inovador ‚Äì O CCA A batalha tradicional por turnos que envolve classes e habilidades agora tem uma novidade. Criamos um sistema diferente que depende fortemente do trabalho em equipe. Realize COMBOS de ataques para ter a CHANCE de causar muito dano e ALTERE a condi√ß√£o dos inimigos!

entry.title: FINAL FANTASY VIII Remastered
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö22,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 11,99¬†‚Ç¨ [11,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 22,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö11,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

------------------------------ „Éª This application requires approximately 2.55GB to download. Please be sure to allocate the necessary amount of time and space on your device before proceeding. „Éª Only one download with a large amount of data will be required while progressing through the game. „Éª Since it is a large application, it will take time to download. We strongly recommend connecting to Wi-Fi when downloading. ------------------------------ [Please read before playing] * Entering or leaving vehicles such as cars and the Garden may occasionally get your character stuck between the vehicle and terrain features, or freeze the vehicle in place. This seems to happen more often when you leave your vehicle in close proximity to impassable terrain, or when you try to enter or leave your vehicle during certain scripted events. Currently, the only fix for this is to reload a previously saved game, so please make sure to save your progress often. * Some locations may be difficult to navigate using the Speed Boost (x3). We advise you to turn off this feature in such cases. * Make sure to check the FAQ section of our support page for solutions to common issues: https://support.na.square-enix.com/main.php?la=1&id=442 We apologize for any inconvenience these issues may cause, and thank you again for your interest in our product. ‚ñ†Summary FINAL FANTASY VIII was first released on February 11, 1999. Beloved by fans, this title has garnered a great deal of popularity even compared to other installments in the FINAL FANTASY franchise, selling more than 9.6 million units worldwide. And now players can enjoy FINAL FANTASY VIII on their smartphone! With renewed character CG, the world of FINAL FANTASY VIII is now more beautiful than ever before. This installment is a remaster of FINAL FANTASY VIII for PC. This application is a one-time purchase. There will be no additional charge incurred after downloading. ‚ñ†Story It is a time of war. The Republic of Galbadia, under the influence of the sorceress Edea, mobilizes its great armies against the other nations of the world. Squall and other members of SeeD, an elite mercenary force, join hands with Rinoa, a resistance fighter, to fight against Galbadia's tyrannical rule and to prevent Edea from fulfilling her ultimate goal. ‚ñ†FINAL FANTASY VIII: Release Features „ÉªGuardian ForceÔºàG.F.Ôºâ G.F. are summoned creatures in FFVIII used to protect the protagonists. Call upon them in battle to unleash their might and to increase their power alongside player characters. By junctioning G.F., players will be able to enjoy greater freedom in how they approach battles. „ÉªDrawing Obtain magic in FFVIII by drawing (extracting) it in battle. MP does not exist and players are limited to the number they have in their possession. Magic that has been extracted can be released on the spot or stocked for later use. „Éª Junctioning This system allows players to equip G.F. and stocked magic to characters in order to increase their power. ‚ñ† Additional Features „Éª Battle Assist Max out HP and ATB gauge during battle and activate Limit Breaks at any time. „Éª No Encounters Players can choose to turn Battle Encounters on or off. „Éª 3x Speed With the exception of certain cutscenes, players can choose to proceed through the game at 3x speed. [Minimum Requirements] iOS 13.0 or higher
